alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 12:56AM PST until February 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained west winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts around 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes, and Mojave Desert in Southeastern Kern County. * WHEN...Valid until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibilities in some locations. Strong wind gusts could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 58, Highway 178, U.S. Highway 395, and Highway 14.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
